content.detailedDescription: Bobby. i never thought that they excid
content.summary: Tucson az

content.detailedDescription: While driving at night in 1977, my wife and i witnessed strange flashing lights in the sky. they weren't flashing in a straight line as an airplane would but they were flashing in random positions and moving erratically. we both noticed them at the same time and she said "what is that?" being an unbeliever at the time, i jokingly replied "close encounters of the third kind". then suddenly the lights came straight toward us and were no longer lights but rather aircraft of some sort. we only saw one at the time and it was hovering just above the treetops, maybe forty feet off the ground. i turned the car down the street where the ufo appeared to be and stopped the car to get a closer look. i got out of the car and was standing in the street looking up at this thing. i was so close that i could see what appeared to be a row of windows down the side and bright white light was emanating from within the craft. there was a weird colored amber light on the front, a blue light in the middle and a white light on the stern. i could see depth or space in the craft though the windows. and the astonishing thing was there wasn't a hint of any noise. no turbulence on the treetops, no hum, no buzz...Totally silent. as i was standing there observing this thing, my wife shouts "randy, there's another one!" from inside the car. she was looking out the back window and saw a second craft coming up at a right angle to the first, like a wing man. again, not a sound. it cruised up and stopped behind the first one. while i'm standing there, the first one slowly glided across the street right in front of my car and started to descent below the treeline on the other side of the street. below the treeline was an school baseball field. my wife said "it's landing in the baseball field" so i hopped back in the car and took off around the corner to the field. it didn't take more than a few seconds to get there and when we did, we could see this thing hovering not ten feet off the ground. it sat there long enough for us to get a good look at it, then suddenly it shot up into the sky at such a high velocity that i knew it could not be man made. it was as if it was sucked back up into the sky. so i took off back to where we had left the second one and it was gone too. right after they left, we could see those weird lights in the sky again but then they disappeared. i haven't told anyone this experience for fear of being ridiculed. my wife has since become very religious and she thinks that what we saw were demons because she knows full well that they weren't of this planet. i myself know that we saw extraterrestrial craft.
content.summary: My wife and i witnessed two ufo's, in the sky at first then they came up close and hovered at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription: I say 5 of them in  a trang,e pattern then after i say 5 jets go by will talk more in person man came to see me after i seen this go silent
content.summary: Will talk in person

content.detailedDescription: I was at work in braselton,ga working a night shift. the time was approx between 10-2 am.I first seen the object as i looked up after walking back to my yard truck after pulling a trailer from the wharehouse doors.I saw a blue and white light hovering about 10-20 ft away directly over my head. i was very unable to process what was happening so i stood their with my inner thoughts until the light ended.Finally after saying something to myself it completely vanished cloud and all.I continued working and thought i was the only one on the yard until i spotted another driver. we both had saw it however his statement was that he saw a fire ball come out of the cloud.I was unable to determine that from my angle. we also saw another object of light form in outer space and it appeared to be charging and then went into hyper speed towards earth. i have had multiple sighting more than to since 2011.Mostly fireballs.It appears these lights are intelligent and not just space debris or shooting stars.I have seen them hover,change directions,altitude,vanish,reappear,fly in formation etc...
content.summary: Blue and white light inside cloud.Fire ball came out of cloud. seconds pass another cigar shaped light appear shot toward earth and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was going though my phone's camera gallery after work the other day and noticed i had a 17 second video that i had must recorded when my phone was in my back pocket. nothing strange about that. i usually keep my phone in my back pocket when i'm at work in the construction yard. before i was going to delete the video i thought i'd check it out to see what i recorded. at first, it looked like to video recorder button had gotten pushed and was recording what was behind me but after a few seconds into the video i see what appears to be a small light figure that appears in the top left of the video for just a few seconds. i wasn't sure what i was seeing at first so i paused and re-watched the video about 20 more times. take a look and tell me what you think. it definitely looks clear enough to tell what this thing could be.
content.summary: Recorded a small grey on my smart phone.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and another marine were walking from our hangar, out to the flight line. 
we both had our tool bags and were talking while walking out there, due to the length of time it took to walk out to our helicopter.
i glanced up to my left, and saw a small, shiny, metallic craft, flying from left to right, way up in the northern sky.
it was a clear day, so it immediately stood out like a sore thumb, and i stopped to look closer. it seemed quite a long ways up, but it was a bright sun shining day and the sun must have been reflecting off of it.
as i was looking at it, it stopped abruptly and another craft just like it, came into view. 
same flight path, but a little higher elevation and not quite as far as the first one.
i turned to my buddy, and asked him if he saw that, as i was pointing towards them?
he said yeah, he saw them too. after a few minutes observing them hovering in the same spots, they both ascended straight up, as quickly as they came into view.
we looked at each other, wondering what we just saw. i honestly don't remember sharing any of this experience with anyone else and i'm not sure my buddy did either. however, i did see him several years later and asked him if he still remembered that, and he did.
i probably didn't, because i thought the guys in our shop might give us a hard time about it. 
i'm not sure how long mufon has been around, but i was watching a show recently, and decided to share my experience.
i've never had any other experiences, that i can remember. however, i have always been curious about the possibility of others having similar experiences.
content.summary: Shiny / metallic dome shape, very fast, too high to hear any noise, abrupt ascent

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home approximately 11 p.M. when i noticed a fire red ball in the night sky. i was heading west in my truck and the red orb was headed south. i came to an intersection and stop at the stop sign put my truck in park grabbed my cell phone took one photo and one short video of the object. i observed the object which was very high in the sky but still under the cloud cover, continue heading south very slowly. the object was a very bright fire red color that seemed to pulsate not really blink but go brighter than dimmer brighter than dimmer. the object then took an angular path upwards and ascended into the cloud cover where i observed the glow in the clouds slowly fade away to blackness.  even though the weather in my area has been raining of late  i was still able to get a clear unobstructed view of the object .
content.summary: I observed a fire red orb in the night sky under cloudy conditions. the object moved very slowly and ascended into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: There was a bad storm in the st louis area last night (6/28/15). my brother was in town from wi and we were at our parents in eureka, mo. we went out on the deck and watched the low clouds go by. it was a weird looking storm with low clouds and bright lights. no rain! i took a bunch of gorgeous pictures of the clouds. i left around 9:45 pm, my brother walked me out. the sky was unusually clear and you could see a lot of stars. these bright lights caught my eyes and i said to my brother, "what is that, a helicopter?" he apparently did not hear me. i drove up to the stop sign and got a good view of the bright lights. there was one longer, very bright one and a smaller one to let right of the larger one. they were both stationary. i stopped and took a couple of pictures because i had no idea what they were. when i was almost home they were in front of me again. not sure if i was facing the same direction. i thought it was odd that they were in front of me again and just as bright. when i looked at the pictures i was surprised to see that it looks like there are several square "windows" in the larger object. not sure what this is, any input is appreciated.
content.summary: Leaving parents in eureka, mo at a little before 10 pm and observed these lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from band rehearsal , my friend nick valceanu, was visiting from indiana, and as we approached the exit on highway 74, the exit that is right at my home..As we approached the exit we observed three distinct bright lights..Larger than a plane , blimp, helicopter etc..

the object was an enourmas triangulr craft...Dark exce[pt for the bright lights on the tips...
it appeared to be just hovering over the forest behind my home..By the time we pulled into my drive way it was gone...
i ran in and told my wife to hurry outside,
together she, myself and my friend nick scanned the sky for any more sight of it.
that was when we noticed the round pulsating orb just to the right of the moon..The moon was very bright and we could distinctly see the orb spinning and changing colors.
it was also stationary.
we also observed many planes and helicopters in the skies..More than usual at least.
i posted the question on face book "did anyone else see something strange in the skies over kings mountain last night?"
and was immediately bombarded with comments from people as far away as kansas saying they also saw the traingle shaped object..It was enormous.
the news this morning also had a piece on it and they were reporting that it was a meteor or space junk...
i know what a meteor and space junk looks like...It was not that.
and someone also said it was venus and mars being visible..If that was it then we should have still been able to see venus and mars after the object disappeared.
i know what i saw..My friend nick knows what he saw as well
it was a huge triangle shaped craft that was hovering...Just sitting there.
i wish i had my camera at the time..I would have taken so many shots of it.
by the time we arrived at my home,from the exit is less than half a mile form my home 
i was ecstatic to see another triangle in the sky..The last time i saw something like this i was a child age 15..Never forgot that.
content.summary: On the way home on hiway 74 at the moss lake exit, bserved triangle shape  hovering over what appeared to be the forest behind my home. by the time i got in my driveway it was gone of lights hovering over the forest behind my home,

content.detailedDescription: I was at home messaging a friend. when i spelled a word wrong and the auto correct filled in ufo. i don't believe in coincidence so i went out side and finished the message to my friend. i remember i was standing there for a few minutes observing the sky as i always do. the next thing i know know i'm staring at a strange white light that has a steady shine and three more lights of red blue and green flashing in a pattern. imedatly i start to think i wish i had a good camera. my scientific mind tells me go through all the aircraft i know of and this didn't  fit. i watched it fly at a high altitude  in a east to west flight path. traveling faster than a normal jet at this altitude. after the craft left my line of sight i saw an airplane traveling the same direction east to west on a parallel flight path not the same path. i to watched this airplane and observed it. it had clear indicator lights and look like one of the many commercial jets i see on a regular basis. the plane took about an extra 30 seconds to cross the sky from my pov on the ground.  i regret i live likedtooseconds longer. this event only reinforces my belief the universe is to large for us to be alone. there are no coincidences and i was ment to see what i saw and make a report for the worlds behalf. we are not alone. but we are not ready.
content.summary: Strange craft seen with irregular light pattern traveling at high altitudes

content.detailedDescription: At 4am my wife and i were woken up f on a loud humming and brigh white lights when we went outside we saw nothing then heard a clicking weird sound when we looked towards the of nice we seen a big goey sack looking thing that was moving at the point when we noticed it a very tall being grey in color stood up from the tall grass then two more on the sides we ran inside we continued to see them gaurding this thing for about an hour i tried recording but both of hour cell phones kept freezing   we went back to the room then we heard the humming and saw the white lights and then it was gone then instantly we heard several helicopters and jets but we living maybe a mile from the airforce base
content.summary: Hard to explain

content.detailedDescription:
Recently i have started to realize that an incident that occurred when i was only about 15 years of age might have been an alien form rather than a ghost as i was told it might have been.  watching hangar 1 as i have, now and then, it started to make more sense that it well could have been an et.

i was asleep in my bedroom and it was approximately 3 or 4am in the morning.  the room was dark with only a little light coming from my bedroom window that was at the foot of my bed near my dresser.  you could still see furniture outlines in the room so i could see shapes.

i was awoken by the sound of someone trying to open the front door which was near my bedroom door but then i realized that all my family was home already and asleep.  it was then fright came up as i realized this was an intruder.  it was raining outside so i could hear the rain too.  i listened to see if perhaps i was just hearing things but then the doorknob actually opened the door which was terrifying to me as it's always locked.  the person came in and i heard the door gently close and then i heard footsteps walking towards my bedroom door.  i knew the sounds of the floor as they were wood and had squeaks here and there and this was authentic, i knew the squeaks.

all of a sudden i heard the steps stop and i realized the person had stopped at the door to my bedroom and was just standing there looking in for a few seconds.   it was then that i realized that i couldn't move.  i was frozen.  i was lying on my right side facing the wall which was right up against my side of the bed.  my grandmother was sleeping with me because she was visiting from another city and my bed was the only large one - enough to accomodate another person.  she was lying on the outside of the bed right next to the door.

the person then entered the room and although i couldn't move i could move my eyes and when the person passed towards the foot of the bed i could see a tall humanlike form which i thought was a male but now that i think of it i don't think it was altogether human, i will explain in a bit.

the person stopped before proceeding into the room completely and was standing looking in my direction right at the head of the bed.  i don't know how i didn't pass out then in fright.  my grandmother did not wake up or move.  then the person walked ahead to where my dresser was, near the window at the foot of the bed, and seemed to open something that sounded like a face cream jar that was half full - a very hollow sound.  i don't know if it took something from my dresser or put something in it.  no idea.

then the person was apparently done doing whatever it did and started to walk back towards the door of my room.  to my horror it stopped again near where our heads were, i was still frozen, and the next thing i knew i could feel the thing's arm coming over and it touched me on the left side of my neck which was exposed as i was lying on my right side.  i could feel that it was touching my neck with 3 fingers only and at the time, and i still think so, it was a thumb and 2 fingers but it could have been just 3 finters.  i didn't feel warmth and now i am thinking it was more of a reptile kind of touch but not sure.  i do know that the thing was very tall and the more i think about it, must have been tall because i was in a queensized bed, was far to the extreme right side of the bed plus my grandmother was between me and the thing.  it had to reach over her and all across the width of that bed to be able to touch my neck like that.  i passed out in fear.

when i woke up from that i screamed, knowing it was not a dream and awoke my family to tell them.  they said that it was raining and that if someone had come in there would be water in the front porch and in the hall but i instinctively knew that there would not be a trace.  and there wasnt.

to this day and i am into my 60ties now i still on occasion sleep with the overs over my neck as the feeling of that touch still haunts me.  

i have to say that while living in that same house i did have a couple of other incidents that were strange and now i wonder if it was all connected or not.  the one that stands out is that, and i don't know if this happened around the same time as this entity appeared or was much earlier or later but one night i was awoken about the same time of the night 3 or 4 am to that same bedroom where i saw the entity by my room totally lit up.  it was like a snow blower city machine was shining it's flood lights into my bedroom window.  it was mid july i think so snow was out.  i got up and went to my window and t he yard was totally lit up too with light but there was no sign of where it was coming from.  however i can't remember looking up.  i might have looked up but i have no memory of that at all.  i can see the yard and grass and big tree that was in front of my window and it was all lit up in white white light but that was it.  something tells me i did look up but there is zero memory of it.  i only mention this because of the entity that was in my room on another night.  i am sure it wasn't the same night though as when i saw the entity because my grandmother was not in the room with me for sure.

i have always been open minded to ufos and most other things like that but i was not immersed in the topic at all - this all just happened out of the blue.  however after watching hangar 1 it seems to be opening ideas that i had not though about before like the entity perhaps having touched me for a purpose.  i sure hope it's not some way of following me throughout my life.  i have had poor health since about 1990 but up til then i was healthy.  there were no marks on my neck from being touched.  the only medical thing that is a little strange perhaps is that i was diagnosed with cancer years later, many  years later, and the issues were all along my left side.  it might of course just be a coincidence.

if there is any other information you require don't hesitate to contact me.
content.summary: Was awoken in middle of the night by something that came into my bedroom, i couldn't move in fear, and on it's way out reached over my grandmother who was staying over and touched me on my neck with 3 fingers.  i passed out in fear.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on our way home from band practice. my boyfriend was driving on the highway and i'm as usual looking out the window and up at the sky, because i was wondering how many stars were out. i notice that in one part of the sky is all cloudy but like a misty kind of cloud dark thick clouds because i couldn't see through them at all. just under and to the left i notice lights, yellow and green. the object seemed to hover and sort of bob up and down slightly. and as soon as i said "omg! what the f#%@ is that! it descended a little bit and quickly ascended as if they heard me and noticed that i noticed them, that's the feeling i got. like they didn't want me to see them. the whole time i'm seeing this i was trying to tell my boyfriend about this, but i'm not sure he believes me. i'll send you a picture on a map exactly where i saw what i strongly believe to be a ufo. after it disappeared the rest of the way home i just wanted to tell everybody what i saw, however when i actually got home for some reason i didn't say anything else about it until this morning.
content.summary: It looked like a sideways oval hovering just under the clouds, it descended and then it ascended  quickly into the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from the beach, it was about 10:50 
pm all of a sudden i see an object appear out of nowhere it was a green object then it turned blue, it might have turned purple but im not quit sure after it turned orange and then it turned red as it was changing colors it was moving to the west and after that i didn't see any colors besides 3 red dots that formed a triangle and there was a white light next to it after  the red dots and white light appeared instead of going west it was going east, the object did not turn around or make a turn it just went east. i could not believe what i was seeing it all happened in less than 30 seconds after that i tried looking for it but could not find it, it felt like it lasted hours after that i could not described  what i have seen i felt like i had anxiety but in a weird way i was shaking i was excited i don't really know how  to describe  the way i was feeling, as i was watching i could not stop staring. it was an awesome experience but it was also so unreal.
content.summary: It changed colrs, the object was going west and a second  after it was going east

content.detailedDescription: I was driving  with my boyfriend down route 44 and the different town and i saw people pulled over on both sides of the road looking up. when i looked up i saw a very large white bright cigar cylinder type shaped object moving so so slow we pulled over to get a better look i instantly didn't feel g when i looked up i saw a very large white bright cigar cylinder type shaped object moving so so slow we pulled over to get a better look.  i instantly started to feel sick   everyone was pulled out of the cars been on the phone making phone calls were taking pictures  i called the police after a few minutes it was not a weather balloon in my eyes i was looking at a ufo when i called the police they had already gotten phone calls and said it was not like a balloon they did not know what it was but they would be looking into it   i've never heard anything about it after that i looked everywhere i never saw helicopters come with police  i feel very uneasy  while you sat there for about 20 minutes to a half hour i was feeling sick to my stomach and i was getting a headache we were just frozen we couldn't leave it was moving so slow maybe 2 miles an hour all of us that had pulled over just couldn't stop staring at it for about 20 minutes to a half hour i was feeling sick to my stomach and i was getting a headache we were just frozen we couldn't leave it was moving so slow maybe 2 miles an hour all of us that had pulled over just couldn't stop staring atit was about 20 to 30 feet from me hovering maybe 100 to 300 feet above us not too far above the tree line while talking to people they said they had been there longer than us but i've been traveling for a while very slow sometimes stopping.  we watched it for about a half hour i was in the car have a headache and scared   i finally talked him into leaving and we kept going the way we were on the road and we left it behind us .  i thought i was crazy i've watched so many ufo things and seen so many i have never heard about anything like  saw on that day i've never forgotten it and then i'm watching one of your shows and the man describes what i saw you only touch base on it for five minutes if not less the description of what he saw what a chill what up my back and i know that me and many others saw the same thing. season 1 episode  and then i'm watching one of your shows and the man describes what i saw you only touch base on it for five minutes if not less the description of what he saw what a chill what up my back and i know that me and many others saw the same thing 6.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cigar cylinder white bright slow curves but no seems or edges seemed all one peice

content.detailedDescription: On june 23rd at 11:45 p.M. i went outside to see if i could see the aurora borealis, as it was supposed to be visable this night much further south than normal. i did not see the northern lights but looking west i observed what at first glance to be a bright star. after looking at it a few seconds it seemed to be pulsating. i took a picture of it with my camera phone and was surprised that the object was bright enough for the camera to pick it up. a few days later i was looking at the picture and decided to enlarge it. upon doing that i was amazed to see 7 orbs around a central sphere. i have observed ufos in the past so i wasn't totally surprised but was excited that i was finally able to photograph one.
content.summary: Took picture of what i thought was ufo, very bright, after enlarging 7 orbs around a sphere were observed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a friend's living room in colwood on triangle mountain.
the orb just appeared out of thin air.
i thought how odd this was.
the object was a soccer ball size purple orb it neither reflected or have off any light it had a dull sheen. the orb just sat there not moving then it was gone as suddenly as it had appeared. 
during the time i saw the orb i thought i was hallucinating then i thought how cool it was to see this. after seeing it i told my friend who told his mom that i was seeing things.
the orb simply disappeared.
content.summary: In friend's living room purple orb hovered over floor vent near fireplace

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from the school field and for some reason i like to look up to view clouds and at that time the round disk was up above and it was headed se direction maybe medium speed. i thought i better not say anything because i figured no one would believe me. i lost sight because i was unsure at what i was looking at and i was headed home.
content.summary: I looked up and seen a round disk up above

content.detailedDescription: Four bright star-like lights moved from east to west across the sky.  the lights were evenly spaced, did not cascade or fall from the sky, did not have trails, just vanished.  i went outside to see the planets that were viable last night.  i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Four evenly spaced lights moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1 - resting on a farm
2 - i grabbed my camera and called two friends
3 - a spaceship
4 - were two objects.The object above the star moves down and aligned with each other and then 2 down.
5 - it was fantastic, i was very happy.
6 - they went down behind the trees.
content.summary: Objects filmed in the city of "cipo - guacu", 40 km of "sao paulo" camera used: sony hdr-cx210 handycam

content.detailedDescription: While leaving house in car observed the lights orbs above treeline lost sight while driving about 1 mile then saw again the configuration reminded me of the star placement on the big dipper constellation -drove to a friends house,lost sight because of trees returned to where last seen they were not there.
content.summary: While driving east on cty hwy q- eau claire county

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching the fireworks on the 4th, and i looked up at the sky to my right to see a extremely bright red light. the light was so bright that it surrounded the entire craft. i was not able to see any shape of the craft because the light was so bright so i am going to say it was a sphere. it did not flash, it was a static light. the craft was relatively high up in the sky, but still below the cloud line. it flew straight across from the right all the way past our front yard and off to the left. because of the height i did not hear any sound, but i still found that a bit odd because other craft around that altitude usually make some sort of noise. the craft would pivot slightly to the left and right. sort of like a boat in rough seas. do not mistaken this for the normal "zipping across the sky" this looked more like wind was effecting it because it was moving at a relatively slow speed.  there were no other lights other than the red. no white lights, no strobes, etc... having said that, i have to take an educated approach to this sighting. even though i might believe in something like this, there is always a possibility that there is a simple explanation to this. i thought to myself, well the slow speed and subtle pivoting, and bright red light... it could have been a helicopter. but not a commercial one because of the bright red light, so then maybe a military helicopter. but the fact that the light was so bright and no other strobing lights were on it, and there was no sound i am having a hard time accepting my own answer to this. i have seen other military helicopters in the area and they are extremely loud. and just to rule it out, it was moving way too fast to be a hot air balloon. we live near a small airfield (bowman field) and i see aircraft all the time, and am quite familiar with the lights on crafts. i look in the sky several times a day waiting to find something, and sure enough i did! this is honestly the first time i have been unable to explain what i saw.  i have a very short video that i took of it, though my phone was low batter and shut off shortly after i started to record so i was unable to take any still images. (go figure, just my luck).
content.summary: Bright red glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription:
1. pulled over talking - mt gladadale (victoria australia)

2. the noise it made as it came up from the bottom of the mountain 

3. ufo

4. the first object we did not see as it passed over our heads (just above the tree line)  the second was in front of the van (it was hovering about 6foot off the ground)

5, fear, i wanted to get out of there, i said as soon as i heard it, it was a ufo, the two guys i was with said it was a truck and we sat there looking for head lights to come up the mountain, after they realised it was not truck the two guys and the dog we had with us jumped out of the car and looked up to the sky to see what they could see, i stayed in the car frozen with fear, i asked myself if i wanted to to see a ufo and finally jumped out of the car and stood with the guys  and looking up to the tree line as the noise aproceh us, we could not see anything but could clearly tell when it reached us, was over the top of us and had passed us,  the noise was so loud the dog was behaving funny and i never heard anything that loud in my life. after it had reach the top of the mountain it moved on and we could not hear it anymore. we stood there talking about it for a bit and the boys when for a walk in the bush. i stayed in the car, marty my boyfriend at the time told me to lock the doors. i had the window do jut enough to hear out side and turn the radio on slightly to try and claim me down. i felt the back of the van move, and thought it was the dog moving around in the back of the van and said it's okay to the dog but soon remembered they guys had taken the dog. i froze with fear again and when i looked out the window there was a small craft about 5 metters away in front of the van just hovering. that;s the last i remember.  

i have more encounters but that one was my first.
content.summary: The one the went above us we did not see but the one in front of the van was about as long at the van and  as wide as a van, glowing lightblue, small dome on top smooth all over, like a fried egg

content.detailedDescription: Me, my brother and his girlfriend saw about 50 blue,  purple, and yellow light trails coming from what looked to be a long cigar shaped black object with a dim light on the front of it. the object was barely noticable almost like an outline but you could tell it was solid. it went over my house in one constant stream with no noise. it looked slightly tilted as if it was descending but when it got to the tree top that is about a two mile drive from my house all the trails disappeared and it looked as if the black object went down lower until we lost sight of it.
content.summary: We saw a black cigar/oval shaped ufo followed by lots of trails/streams of colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving a friends house at about 12:30ish in the morning (night time) and i looked up at the sky like i always do to look at the moon and just think about life and etc then i seen 3 orange lights flying straight kind of north east and each of the 3 orange lights had very long rays of a bright light trailing behind them. i didn't hear anything they made no sound they were very high up sadly i didn't have my phone on me or anything so i ran towards the way they were going and i reached some trees and i kept running but i didn't see them anymore after they went behind they trees so i start thinking and freaking out like did i just see that? was it a star but it was too big to be a star and it was 3 of them next to each other they were different sizes i started to get chills and jittery checking behind me as i kept walking home and started getting light headed but it went away. but i seen what i seen i'm not crazy i just sound like it but doesn't every person who claims they've seen a ufo let alone 3
content.summary: Was walking from a friends looked up and seen 3 orange lights with bright long rays of lights coming from each orange or i ran to follow it and it kept going behind some trees and disappears. then i felt very weirdo began to have chills,light headed ness

content.detailedDescription: I was walking up my driveway, and i just happened to look right, over my shoulder, and into the air, i say the bright flash, and a streak of light left by the object, it quickly dimmed. it was a pale white color flash, and the glow left behind in the light streak was like the afterglow of a bright light in your vision. the streak disappeared. i thought that i had just witnessed a fireball. i said "wow" my buddy says "what?" he had not seen or noticed the flash of light. as i was telling him, the object reappeared on the same path as the streak of light. at first it was dim, but it increased in brightness, then quickly faded away. "look" i said to my friend and pointed he looked, and sure enough, a second or two later, it came back. he saw it this time. the color had changed, the object was now a red/orange color, and not nearly as bright. this happened a total of five times, including the initial flash, each time it came back, it was harder to see it, then it finally was gone. this lasted 10-15 seconds. i first noticed it to my north, it was traveling, west to east.
content.summary: A bright flash, that disappeared, then reappeared, less intense, and repeated, until i lost sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Right after sunset i was in my backyard with my 4 yr-old grandson filming the many dragon flies flying above our house. i could not really capture them, but as i was trying, my eyes caught sight of a very bright object in the nnw sky about 50 degrees up, and as bright as the planet venus at dusk (which we happened to also see), and about as 'large' from where i stood, too. 
it was moving faster than an airplane, so i thought it was a meteorite, but its brilliance was sun reflection, not fire. at one point it went 'dark' and i could no longer see, but not long afterwards it was visible again, and much farther along on its trajectory but much fainter too. as i was filming (sadly not in that direction) i said to my grandson "what was that ...?" that is why i can be sure of the time when i saw it.

as it traveled faster than a plane, i thought it might have been the space station, but checking up on its course, i noticed it was not in my area during that day and time.

the object did not veer off its trajectory. i lost sight of it because it became too small/faint as it gained distance.

i felt excited, and also annoyed and frustrated because i could not identify it. i mused to my grandson that it could be an alien spaceship, but that worried him some. when i told him i wanted to get binoculars to see the object better, he was uncomfortable to let me go inside, so i didn't, and stayed with him and watched the object until it was no longer visible.

he later asked me if space aliens are real and i answered that i don't know, but that i have never seen one.
content.summary: The ufo was as bright as the planet venus at dusk and about as 'large'. i thought it might be the space station; as it traveled faster than a plane, but the space station was not in my area.

content.detailedDescription:
Not long after seeing the lights traveling at different angles in the night sky, i had a strange experience.

i was taking the metro home from work.  it was a very crowed metro, peak hours, all chairs were taken and several standing. the metro came to a stop, the doors opened several more people came in, but there was one that caught my attention creating a suffocation feeling and i became extremely uncomfortable.  trying to reason with myself that the feeling was ridiculous and uncalled for i tried to focus on not looking in his direction.  from what i glanced at quickly from time to time this person had absolutely nothing unusual about them.  average height, brown hair 30 something, casual office dressed, standing at the far corner of the metro. i continued to focus on showing nothing and looking out the window, when the metro stopped and the person next to me left. there were several people standing next to the chair but no one sat down when i noticed he was walking towards the empty seat next to me, and sat down.  i focused even more on showing nothing and continued looking out the window.  we did several stops when he got up and left.  but just before he stood up he rested his hand on my knee and then squeezed his thumb and finger so hard on my leg that the pain ran through me so hard it took my breathe away he did this as he slowly stood up. i had no marks or bruises however and i bruise very easily.  the memory and feeling is as sharp today as the day it happened and i have a very poor memory but not only poor i do not affiliate emotion with my memories very well.  this experience is very different and when i think of it i become irritated uncomfortable and a deep desire to understand.  now i don't think that the two experiences have anything to do with each other.  but both were within the same week and both extremely unusual. i was alone for this experience but the story above i was with a friend.
content.summary: Several lights in the sky, while star gazing with friend.  noiced that the lights were turning abruplty at sharp angles, i thought it was satelites till my friend said satelites do nto turn at those angles.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside enjoying the evening in the cottage community where i was vacationing. a bring light moving at an extraordinary speed came along and did three 90 degree direction changes before continuing on its path. the object was brighter than a planet or star. i lost sight of it when it moved behind the treeline.
content.summary: Moved quickly and changed direction

content.detailedDescription: Observed  several objects going across the sky from a southeast direction to a northeast direction. could have been junk buring up in the atmosphere. left a trail. took a cellphone videos lasting 14 secs.
content.summary: Looked like several  ojects burning up in the atmosphere. like a trail behind. didn't last long.
